stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 agenda counter on it. click, hosted agenda counter: Draw 4 cards. Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. The Corp can use this ability even if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 agenda counter on it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 4 cards. Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. The Corp can use this ability even if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
title: Next Big Thing
